import React, { Component } from 'react' import PostService from '../../../service/post.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class NewPost extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { title: '', content: '', genre: '', typology: '' } this.newPostService = new PostService() } handleInputChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } finishAction = () => { this.props.hideModalWindow() } handleSubmit = e => { this.newPostService.createPost() .then(response => this.setState({ posts: response.data })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { return ( <>

) } } export default NewPost
